archimate:Node.name: File and Backup Server (FBSv)
archimate:Node.documentation:
Intended Use:
• Centralized file storage, document management, secure backups for clinical records, administrative documentation, and disaster recovery.
Specifications:
• Processor Type: o Dual Intel Xeon/AMD EPYC processors (12 cores each). • Memory Capacity: o 128 GB ECC RAM minimum, expandable. • Storage Capacity and Configuration Options: o 40 TB usable capacity (high-capacity HDD with SSD cache) o RAID 6 or RAID 10 configuration for redundancy and reliability o Scalable external storage expansion options available. • Network Connectivity: o Dual-port Gigabit or 10GbE network adapters (performance and redundancy). • Form Factor: o Rack-mounted server (2U–4U standard form factor). • Redundancy Features: o Dual redundant power supplies, redundant network interfaces, RAID redundancy. • Power Supply Rating: o Dual redundant power supplies (600–900W, 80 PLUS Gold or Platinum). • Cooling System: o Redundant, hot-swappable cooling fans, optimized airflow. • Virtualization Support: o VMware, Hyper-V, Citrix virtualization compatible. • Operating System Compatibility: o Windows Server 2022 o Linux Server (RHEL, Ubuntu).
